comment: * Abstract formatter for dates. Differs from DateFormat in that it * provides withLocale and withTimeZone methods. * @hide Only a subset of ICU is exposed in Android

methods.name: String format(Date date)
methods.comment:
* Format the date, provided as a java Date object.
   * 
   * @param date the date
   * @return the formatted time

methods.name: String format(long date)
methods.comment:
* Format the date, provided as milliseconds.
   *
   * @param date the date in milliseconds
   * @return the formatted time

methods.name: DateFormatter withLocale(String localeName)
methods.comment:
* Returns a new DateFormatter that uses data for a new locale.
   *
   * @param locale the new locale to use
   * @return a new formatter for the given locale

methods.name: DateFormatter withTimeZone(TimeZone tz)
methods.comment:
* Returns a new DateFormatter that uses the new time zone.
   *
   * @param tz the new time zone
   * @return a new formatter for the given time zone
